title: Over-sea;
author: Morford, Henry
snippet: There was a pleasant glance, which I caught as we stopped for a moment at Dumblane, of Jessie's child — " Jessie, the Flower of Dumblane" — I knew her instantly, sitting on the steps of one of the cottage-doors, barefoot, and playing with her chubby little toes ! Then we passed the Bridge of Allan, over that " Allan Water" so famous in song; and the shaded b^nks seemed to be whispering something pleasant from the pastoral d:iys.

title: Early Travellers in Scotland. Edited by P. Hume Brown. [With maps.]
author: Brown, Peter Hume.
